name: Shelteroid
description:
Controls:

WASD    - Move Camera.
Q, E    - Move Rail Cart. 1, 2    - Change Tool. Mouse Left Click - Use Tool.

Story:

The nearby planet has been destroyed by an unknown assailant. The escapee ship managed to warp to your station, but crashed into it and disabled some systems by it and destroyed your evacuation vehicle. Now it's up to you to gather enough resources to survive. There's also signs of something scanning the nearby sectors, so beware of the immiment visitors.

Use your robotic arm to grab resources, bombs and asteroids to store them, or to just throw them. Survive the eventual threat and be rescued and be the ultimate space survivor.

Credits for Music:
